@graph.name: Historical Permission Notice and Disclaimer - Pbmplus variant
@graph.comment: This license is nearly a match for HPND, but omits first sentence of third clause regarding no reps, and only includes the second sentence regarding "as is". In the original HPND that entire clause is optional.
